Frontend Development

Front end refers to the area of a website where users interact directly. It is sometimes referred to as the application's "client side."

Frequently Used Frontend Technologies

HTML: HyperText Markup Language is what HTML stands for. It is used to create web pages' front ends using markup language. Since it is used to create a website's structure, it serves as the skeleton of the website. Here are top youtube channels from where you can learn HTML.

Code With Harry

Apna College

Sheryians Coding School

Kevin Stratvert

CSS: Cascading Style Sheets, sometimes known as CSS, is a straightforwardly written language that makes it easier to present web pages. Our website is styled with it.
